dmca.title: BSA Claims Infringement
dmca.body:
1.  The copyrighted works at issue are Autodesk AutoCAD, Adobe Acrobat as well as numerous other copyrighted works. 
 
 
2.   Search query on Google.com:
 
      Infringing web pages in search results:
 
 
SEARCH TERM:  OEM SOFTWARE
 
http://softwarebackups.org/  
 
http://www.oemsoftsales.net/   
 
 
SEARCH TERM:  codegearbuilder
 
http://www.crackdb.org/codegear.builder.torrent/search_codegear+builder_crack_keygen_serial_nocd_cracked.html  
 
http://torrentportal.com/torrents-details.php?id=1226054&filelist=1  
 
http://torrentportal.com/details/1226054/CodeGear+C%2B%2B+Builder+2007.torrent  
 
http://torrentz.ws/search/codegear-builder
 
http://www.torrentreactor.net/search/codegear+builder+2007+enterprise+trial+update+files/  
 
http://www.torrentreactor.net/search/codegear+builder+2007+enterprise/  
 
http://torrentz.ws/torrent/564227/CodeGear-C-Builder-2007-Enterprise-Trial-Patch-Files
 
 
SEARCH TERM:  cracks
  
http://www.newcracks.net/
 
 
SEARCH TERM:  serial numbers
  
http://www.scribd.com/doc/15542/Serial-Numbers-for-every-kind-of-Software-you-can-imagine-
 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
3.  I can be contacted at paulf@bsa.org.
 
4.  The above website does not provide a contact address.
 
5.  Based upon BSA's representation of the copyright owners in anti-piracy matters, we have a good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been authorized by the rightsholders, their agents, or the law.
 
6.  BSA represents that the information in this notification is accurate and states, under penalty of perjury, that it is authorized to act in this matter on behalf of the copyright owners listed above.
 
 
 
_____________________________
[private]
Internet Investigator
Business Software Alliance
[private]@bsa.org
[private]
 
*The Business Software Alliance ( www.bsa.org ) is the foremost organization dedicated to promoting a safe and legal digital world.  BSA is the voice of the world's commercial software industry and its hardware partners before governments and in the international marketplace.  Its members represent one of the fastest growing industries in the world.  BSA programs foster technology innovation through education and policy initiatives that promote copyright protection, cyber security, trade and e-commerce.  BSA members include Adobe, Apple, Autodesk, Avid, Bentley Systems, Borland, CNC Software/Mastercam, Corel, McAfee, Microsoft, Monotype Imaging, PTC, Quark, Quest Software, Siemens PLM Software, SolidWorks, Sybase, Symantec, and The MathWorks.
